amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Nuclear Energy (Yucca Mountain high-level waste repository) by $25 million and to increase funding for Science (high energy physics) by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds in the Nuclear Energy account by $25,000,000 and increase funds in the Science account by $25,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Heck (NV) amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 335 (Roll no. 325).
